mainText:
No, of course I wasn't lucky enough to have known him personally, but I do
remember sitting near him in a restaurant in Assen at the Aspen Design
Conference in the 1980s. At that conference a fellow designer I was speaking
with remarked how they just came out with computers that can do your
mechanicals for you.....No more pasting up on art boards one's design to be
printed.  ....and the rest is history.
author: Melinda
